4 Ways to Spend Less Time Answering Customer Email.

By Jarrod on August 14th, 2013 / 3 Comments

You start the day by sitting down at your desk, ready to write code for a new feature. Then you open your email client and notice a dozen support tickets waiting for you. "I can knock these out quickly," you think.

Then you look up and it's 2pm.

Where did the day go? What happened to building out that new feature? Email has struck again.

There's a way to spend less time answering email. You've probably already guessed it starts with using Postal App. But, it's about more than just switching email clients. It's about a state of mind.

How To Set Up Postal's Email Filtering Algorithms.

By Jarrod on August 15th, 2013 / 12 Comments

Email filtering algorithms sound really cool. Like, lightsaber cool. But the concept is actually really simple: Postal learns from your habits of reading, ignoring, and replying to email to figure out which new email you need to see first.

But it gets even cooler when you realize you can customize Postal's algorithms. And you don't even need to be a math whiz.

You can force Postal to obey your preferences. With just 5 minutes of work, you'll be saving countless minutes because you won't have to sift through all the junk email to find the important stuff.
